weekly_top_story.headline: China stages grand Beijing parade displaying new military hardware with attendance from Putin and Kim Jong Un
weekly_top_story.summary: China held a large military parade showcasing new weapons in Beijing, symbolizing rising military strength and cementing political-military ties between China, Russia, and North Korea, indicating shifting global power dynamics.

stories.headline: At least 15 killed and 18 injured after a historic streetcar derails in Lisbon
stories.summary: A major accident involving a landmark electric streetcar in Lisbon resulted in 15 deaths and 18 injuries, raising concerns about urban transport safety and emergency response in the city.

stories.headline: Hurricane Kiko intensifies to Category 4 in the Pacific Ocean
stories.summary: Hurricane Kiko has strengthened into a Category 4 storm posing significant threats to coastal populations in the Pacific region, prompting urgent weather warnings and emergency preparedness measures.

stories.headline: Suicide bombing near political rally kills at least 13 in Pakistan
stories.summary: A suicide attack targeting nationalist party supporters in southwest Pakistan resulted in over a dozen deaths and multiple injuries, underscoring ongoing security challenges in the region.
